title: My microphone in Google Pixel 3 stop working after 1 day of using, what can I do now?
content:
Hi, 
I bought new Pixel 3 yesterday and i was using it normal. After few hours of brake from phone, main microphone stop working I cannot talk with assistant or even call to someone. The only way i can call is the headset. How can i fix it? Is there any way?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
